titles.title: Come And Praise The Living God

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Come and praise the living God Come and worship, come and worship He has made you priest and king, Come and worship the living God.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We come not to a mountain of fire and smoke, Not to gloom and darkness or trumpet sound, We come to the new Jerusalem, The holy city of God.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}By His voice He shakes the earth, His judgments known throughout the world. But we have a city that forever stands, The holy city of God.{/lang-eng}
